channel.title: Official Zadex
channel.description:
Welcome to Zadex's advertisement thread.
I'm going to tell you straight why to pick us without telling 100k features in a list.
- The Links - YOU DO NOT NEED TO REGISTER TO PLAY. Webclient: http://www.zadex.zzl.org Downloads: http://www.zadex.zzl.org/files/files.html website: http://www.zadex.zzl.org
-About Zadex- Zadex is a oldschoolish 2007 RSPS. We are not a re-make and we have our own storylines. To become a player of zadex you can start playing by going on our website. www.zadex.zzl.org
-Quick Starting Guide- 1. Start webclient or downloaded version of Zadex 2. Pick a username that you would like to take, then put your password and remember to make one that isn't quess-able. 3. You have created your first Zadex Character now you need to talk to Lumbridge guide in lumbridge he will introduce you fully to Zadex and explain what to do, how to make money and stuff like that.
-More about us- We have quest storylines, also 99s are respected because you need actually train on it, if you don't enjoy level-up you should not pick us. We have also bosses + slayer points system including real slayer rewards so PvM has a good point, also bosses will be dropping amazing items if you're enough lucky. We also have awesome website from the RuneScape at 2007. We have VPS which means we are always online. Zadex is a RSPS that is not running for money, it's running for enjoyement. Try us out, it definetly worths it.
-ALSO- Zadex does not have any kind of custom items. Zadex has upgraded engine and has no lag walking or other popular lag issues. Zadex has weekly updates, not updates every 5 minutes also they will be warned in-game with a timer. Zadex has minigames, quests, bosses, training locations and many other place to teleport, we support also many skills to train real way.
-Media- [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/293x91j.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2ni8h0o.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/10xfxmx.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/ejealu.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/34oso3m.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2mmvapt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2epoew0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2i9p2bm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/wgxh77.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/4zthtu.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2w2kdmr.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/f4qvcw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/30rut0g.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/28kr1ah.jpg[/img]
- The Links - YOU DO NOT NEED TO REGISTER TO PLAY. Webclient: http://www.zadex.zzl.org Downloads: http://www.zadex.zzl.org/files/files.html website: http://www.zadex.zzl.org

item.title: Official Zadex
item.dc:creator: @MentiosRSPS MentiosRSPS
item.description:
@MentiosRSPS wrote:

Welcome to Zadex’s advertisement thread.

I’m going to tell you straight why to pick us without telling 100k features in a list.

  • The Links -
    YOU DO NOT NEED TO REGISTER TO PLAY.
    Webclient: http://www.zadex.zzl.org
    Downloads: http://www.zadex.zzl.org/files/files.html
    website: http://www.zadex.zzl.org

-About Zadex-
Zadex is a oldschoolish 2007 RSPS. We are not a re-make and we have our own storylines.
To become a player of zadex you can start playing by going on our website. www.zadex.zzl.org

-Quick Starting Guide-

  1. Start webclient or downloaded version of Zadex
  2. Pick a username that you would like to take, then put your password and remember to make one that isn’t quess-able.
  3. You have created your first Zadex Character now you need to talk to Lumbridge guide in lumbridge he will introduce you
    fully to Zadex and explain what to do, how to make money and stuff like that.

-More about us-
We have quest storylines, also 99s are respected because you need actually train on it,
if you don’t enjoy level-up you should not pick us. We have also bosses + slayer points system including
real slayer rewards so PvM has a good point, also bosses will be dropping amazing items if you’re enough lucky.
We also have awesome website from the RuneScape at 2007. We have VPS which means we are always online.
Zadex is a RSPS that is not running for money, it’s running for enjoyement. Try us out, it definetly worths it.

-ALSO-
Zadex does not have any kind of custom items.
Zadex has upgraded engine and has no lag walking or other popular lag issues.
Zadex has weekly updates, not updates every 5 minutes also they will be warned in-game with a timer.
Zadex has minigames, quests, bosses, training locations and many other place to teleport, we support also many skills to train
real way.
